item.title:
Weather in Antarctica is generally classified with 3 levels
The most severe is 'condition 1': windspeed over 102 km/h, temperature < −73 °C, visibility less than 30 m.
In other words: hell
[📹 Tomasz Kurczaba: https://t.co/QJYSjnOcgR] https://t.co/zPGpNMUMys https://t.co/l0UOxqdlKN

item.title:
In June of 1945, Feynman's wife and high-school sweetheart, Arline, passed away at the age of 25. 16 months later, Feynman wrote her a letter and sealed it in an envelope. It remained unopened until after his death in 1988.
October 17, 1946
D’Arline,
I adore you, sweetheart.… https://t.co/pWxoO33YLZ https://t.co/9P6AaFbtl5

item.title:
The Honey Possum is the only non flying animal in the world to live solely on a diet of nectar and pollen.
Males have the largest sperm of any mammal in the world (0.36 mm), whilst their young are born weighing only 0.005 grams
[📹 Grassland Films] https://t.co/mo73D22Zd2

item.title:
Cancer immunology seems like a good example: a small shift in the "cell-state tool-kit" leads to better elimination of cancer by the body.
Wouldn't be surprised to see similar "low-d" successes in other fields, but till seems a long shot from designing organs!
